```{python}
team = "Timber Hearth"
```

```{python}
import pandas as pd
from itables import show
```

```{python}
df = pd.read_csv("kpis_fantasy_land_mhs.csv", parse_dates=True)

df_team = df[df["team"] == team]

df_team_most_recent_month = df_team[df_team['date'] == df_team['date'].max()]
```

## KPI

```{python}
show(
  df_team_most_recent_month.melt(id_vars=["team","date"])[['variable', 'value']]
  )
```
